title: please riot
body: riot monday is my birthday can i please please have championhsip zed to buy i rlly want it pls riot even if its extra

replies.body: TY i try both i hope i get thanks anyway

Happy early birthday, friend!  While we can't offer [legacy ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)skins on a whim like that, I hope you have some fun plans ahead!  Unless it appears in the store, you can also find him through hextech crafting or even mystery gifts.   That could be quite an incentive if anyone is looking to get you something!  Good luck!
